title: Trudeau denounces church burnings, vandalism in Canada
content:

  2. World Insights: New batch of unmarked graves found near former indigenous residential school, Canada Day marked by outrage, protests - Xinhua | English.news.cn  Xinhua

  4. The toxic legacy of the British empire in Canada’s residential schools  The Guardian
